name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: An introductory course in Chemistry, which covers basic concepts in the field, such as the periodic table, chemical bonds, and thermodynamics.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: A course in the structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds.

name: Analytical Chemistry I
description: A course in the fundamentals of analytical chemistry, which covers topics such as instrumentation, spectroscopy, and electrochemistry.

name: Analytical Chemistry II
description: An advanced course in analytical chemistry, which covers topics such as chromatography, mass spectrometry, and chemical kinetics.
